Package model

Interface MovementRule

All Known Implementing Classes:
Aphrodite, Apollo, Athena, DefaultMovementRule, Hypnus, Minotaur
public interface MovementRule
Author:
Fumagalli An interface that describes a rule applied in deciding if a worker can move on a square or not

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean doCheckRule​(MovementAction action)
    The method that checks the rule
    void doForced​(MovementAction action)
    A method that does a forced move on a worker according to rules if necessary
    boolean isOpponent()
    A method that states for initialization purpose, if this rule will affect owner's phase or opponents' phases

  • Method Details

    • doCheckRule

      boolean doCheckRule​(MovementAction action)
      The method that checks the rule
      Parameters:
      action - is the movement action (worker + destination)
      Returns:
      true if the condition is fulfilled

    • doForced

      void doForced​(MovementAction action)
      A method that does a forced move on a worker according to rules if necessary
      Parameters:
      action - is the action that would cause the forced move

    • isOpponent

      boolean isOpponent()
      A method that states for initialization purpose, if this rule will affect owner's phase or opponents' phases
      Returns:
      true if the rule will affect only opponents' phases
